document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Levant, Iran , Siberia, North Africa ( Alonso-Zarazaga 2011a ).

Biology. Forest edge, meadows, agricultural habitats. Adults occur in III–VIII. On Fabaceae :
Lathyrus pratensis
,
L. tuberosus
,
Vicia sativa
,
V. sepium
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1965 ; Dieckmann 1977 );
V. cracca
,
V. dumetorum
,
V. faba
,
V. pannonica
,
V. villosa
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Dieckmann 1977 ); Cicer arietinum ( Hoffmann 1958 );
V. angustifolia ( Dieckmann 1977 )
.
